abstract: English Football Assn announces that it will be more difficult for non-European players to gain British work permits beginning May 2015; move is part of plan designed to prevent imports from stifling development of homegrown players; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The English Football Association said non-European players would find it harder to gain British work permits starting in May.

headline.main: Hurdles for Non-Europeans in British Soccer
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Hurdles for Non-Europeans

snippet: The English Football Association said non-European players would find it harder to gain British work permits starting in May.
